example_sentence_english: I want to show the photos.

notes: present indicative (voi); also past participle feminine plural
also identical to the informal imperative (tu) form

example_sentence_italian: Io mostravo le foto ogni settimana.
example_sentence_english: I used to show the photos every week.

example_sentence_italian: Noi mostravamo i risultati ogni mese.
example_sentence_english: We were showing the results every month.

example_sentence_italian: Loro mostravano i documenti al cliente.
example_sentence_english: They were showing the documents to the client.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'mostrato'
